name: Chill Balloon
description:
Navigate your balloon to its destination, attempt to land on the target as best you can. Let the wind take you home, enjoy the flight!

Just a single press to toggle your balloon's burner on and off.

  • W, SPACE or the UP arrow on the keyboard.
  • The main controller face button (e.g. A) or left-click on the mouse.

Change time using left/right (controller, A, D or the arrow keys), or the on screen buttons.

Please be patient playing in the browser (140mb). Alternatively, download and run on your operating system for better results.

A simple game idea entered into the One Button Game Jam 2020.
